item.title: Singapore is prepared to take action in response to Ebola
item.description:
Singapore’s Ministry of Health (MOH) has implemented the World Health Organization’s (WHO) recommendations for Ebola virus disease (EVD) preparedness and is going even further. The ministry is prepared to adjust its measures as the situation changes. One of the recommendations is to educate travelers about the potential dangers of EVD. The MOH is using various channels, such as its website and media releases, to inform the public and potential travelers about the disease...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singapore-is-prepared-to-take-action-in-response-to-ebola/
